# URLCache.StoragePolicy

**Enumeration**

These constants specify the caching strategy used by an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/CachedURLResponse] object.

## Declaration

```swift
enum StoragePolicy
```

## Policies

- **URLCache.StoragePolicy.allowed**: Storage in [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLCache] is allowed without restriction.
- **URLCache.StoragePolicy.allowedInMemoryOnly**: Storage in [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLCache] is allowed; however storage should be restricted to memory only.
- **URLCache.StoragePolicy.notAllowed**: Storage in [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLCache] is not allowed in any fashion, either in memory or on disk.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
